item.title: HackTheBox Challenge - Took the Byte
item.author: shiny-labs@kylma.fr (shiny-labs)
item.description: Description Someone took my bytes! Can you recover my password for me? sha256: ee86f6c49a6c7e8adc09f03efd21825e3d4b5e5058e733e5cc3c9f69826c59a4 Solution Inside the archive, there’s only a file named password. Buh, that file looks like garbage. $ hd password 00000000 af b4 fc fb eb ff f7 ff f7 ff 28 63 aa b1 ff ff |..........(c....| 00000010 ff ff ff ff ff ff ff ff ff ff f3 ff ef ff 8f 9e |.
